title: Kubernetes-based RAG Platform (Lab)
description: Containerized retriever, LLM, vector store, and API for a RAG pipeline; deployed with GitOps (Argo CD / Flux) including automatic rollback and observability.

title: Dagster Data & Model Pipeline (Lab)
description: Orchestrated pipeline for data ingestion, schema/statistical validation, and feature engineering with Dagster, triggered and monitored via CI.

title: AI-driven Stock Portfolio Summarizer (AI + MCP)
description: LLM-powered service that summarizes portfolio holdings, sector exposure, and risk using an MCP server to connect broker and market data sources; deployed on Kubernetes with metrics and logs.
